name: sample_app
author: Esho Oluwasegun <eshooluwasegun98@gmail.com>
description: 1. **Datasource**: This folder holds database connection configuration files 2. **Model**: This folder holds schema files 3. **Repositroy**: This folder holds ORM connection files 4. **Service**: This folder holds business logic files 4. **Controller**: This folder holds files which consumes the service files 4. **Router**: This folder holds files for endpoint routes
